P

pickResponderName() - Method in class ChatBot
method that uses a random number generator to pick which 'personality' the bot will respond with.
Player_Bot - Class in <Unnamed>
extends the PlayerForGame class but includes a method to randomly pick a move since the computer player or bot can't actually make that decision on its own
Player_Bot(String) - Constructor for class Player_Bot
constructor that calls on the super class PlayerForGame to actually instantiate the player
PLAYER_STATUS - Enum in <Unnamed>
enumerated class to keep track of which players are eliminated and which ones won
PLAYER_STATUS(String) - Constructor for enum PLAYER_STATUS
 
PlayerForGame - Class in <Unnamed>
Class to represent each player in the game.
PlayerForGame(String) - Constructor for class PlayerForGame
Constructor for any player that will be participating in the game
playerPoints - Variable in class PlayerForGame
current points value of the player.
players - Variable in class Game
Creates an array of players, the first position is always the Bot and the remaining are the various users.
playerUserName - Variable in class PlayerForGame
way to identify the player, should be the user name for ease of identification to the server
processing() - Method in class ChatBotClient
This method is where most of the server to client interactions happen.
processing() - Method in class ChatBotServer.SockServer
This method contains the framework for the main exchange between the client and the server.
